summary: A rookie flyer, Ens. Alan Drake, joins the famous Hellcats Squadron right out of flight school in Pensacola. He doesn't make a great first impression when he is forced to ditch his airplane... See full summary Â»
cast: Robert Taylor|Ruth Hussey|Walter Pidgeon|Paul Kelly|Shepperd Strudwick|Red Skelton|Nat Pendleton|Dick Purcell|William Tannen|William Stelling|Stanley Smith|Addison Richards|Donald Douglas|Pat Flaherty|Forbes Murray|Marsha Hunt|Irving Bacon|Cliff Danielson|Bob Davis|Bruce Edwards|Lee Tung Foo|Reed Hadley|John Hamilton|Otto Han|Hal Le Sueur|Jack Luden|James Millican|Alberto Morin|Tom Neal|George Offerman Jr.|Claire Owen|Steve Pendleton|John Raitt|Walter Sande|James Seay|John Sheehan|Dick Wessel|Gayne Whitman|Gilbert Wilson|Howard Wilson
title: Flight Command
